junit.framework.Test
public class RepositoryServletSecurityTest
extends org.codehaus.plexus.spring.PlexusInSpringTestCase

RepositoryServletSecurityTest Test the flow of the authentication and authorization checks. This does not necessarily perform redback security checking.
